MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 05-JAN-2021 22:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:52pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:43pm on 5th January 2021.
